text: The New Hampshire Wild are an independent American professional baseball team based in Concord, New Hampshire. They play in the Empire Professional Baseball League, which is not affiliated with Major League Baseball. == History == The team was a member of the league during the inaugural 2016 season, playing at Franklin Pierce University in Rindge. After not participating in the 2017 season, on February 23, 2018, the league announced the revival of the New Hampshire Wild. Their new home field was announced as Concord's Memorial Field. ==External links== * Official website ==References== Category:Professional baseball teams in New Hampshire Category:2016 establishments in New Hampshire Category:Baseball teams established in 2016 Category:Concord, New Hampshire
title: New Hampshire Wild
